example.parse: (TOP (SQ (NP-SBJ (PRON_3FS هِيَّ)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG ناقْصَة) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG مَسْخَرَة)) (CONJ وِ) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN اِسْتِخْفاف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN عُقُول) (NP (DET+NOUN البَشَر))))))))) (SQ (NP-SBJ (PRON_3FS هِيَّ)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG ناقْصَة) (NP (NP (NOUN بَلاوِي)) (ADJP (ADJ_COMP أَكثَر) (PP (PREP مِن) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON اللِّي)) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN الشَباب)) (PP-PRD (PREP فِي) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))))))))))))
